column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A drunk soldier fired off shots while out drinking. The incident occurred at “Party”KTV
column6: 1 Por Sen Chey in the early hours of 28th February
column9: a 40-year-old military officer at the deputy chief of staff
column10: got into an argument with the unnamed victim before the gunfire. Nobody was reported injured.------ After the incident
column11: the victim filed a complaint to police to prepare a case  in Posenchey district. ------Rasmei News------EDIT: A later reports say that the shooter
column13: accidentally shot himself in the hand during
column14: or shortly after the incident and is now being questioned..
